original_text: If he came in by himself, he shall go out by himself: if he were married, then his wife shall go out with him.
korean_text: 만일 그가 단신으로 왔으면 단신으로 나갈 것이요 장가 들었으면 그의 아내도 그와 함께 나가려니와

sentences.original_text: If he came in by himself
he shall go out by himself
then his wife shall go out with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그의 아내도 그와 함께 나가야 할 것이다
